passage_text: The U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics (BLS) does not specifically list salary data for afterschool program directors. However, as of 2013, the median annual wage for educational administrators in preschools and child care centers/programs was $44,890. While afterschool program directors are not specifically listed, the BLS did report that the more general category of preschool and childcare center directors is expected to see a of 17% growth between 2012 and 2022.

After School Program Director Salary. After School Program Director average salary is $50,238, median salary is $48,420 with a salary range from $42,168 to $61,942. After School Program Director salaries are collected from government agencies and companies. Each salary is associated with a real job position. Job Description. An afterschool program director manages programs outside of school hours for children. The program may be sponsored by the school district, a church, or a nonprofit organization, but program directors generally work closely with day schools to provide an enriching and educationally sound experience.
